## Effective file management requires two actions

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# snip this code chunk to create cm034-02.png
# Tools > Global Options > Appearance > 200% before snipping

  source("carpentry/filename.R")

  read_csv("data/filename.csv")

  source("design/filename.R")
  
  include_graphics("figures/filename.png")

```

# Files are explicitly linked  



## Workflow and explicit links using relative file paths 

\includegraphics[height=0.6\baselineskip]{../resources/icon-folder.png} carpentry directory

        tidy-data-01.R

reads file from raw-data directory

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
    read_csv("data-raw/first-data-set-raw.csv")
```

produces tidy data and saves to data directory 

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
    write_csv("data/first-data-set-tidy.csv")
```




## Workflow and explicit links using relative file paths 

\includegraphics[height=0.6\baselineskip]{../resources/icon-folder.png} reports directory

        d1-report.Rmd

includes code chunks that run the R script to produce the tidy data 

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
    source("carpentry/tidy-data-01.R")
```

execute the R script to create the graph 

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
    source("design/d1-graph.R")
```

and imports the graph 

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
    include_graphics("figures/d1-graph.png")
```
